title: Which is the 'most scoring' subject among 'history', 'political science' and 'public administration' in the UPSC Mains (optional)? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: It is very difficult to conclude the most scoring optional subject in the mains of Civil Services Examination. Rather than thinking about it, one should channelise all the energies into the subject of one choice and deep interest. It will provide an added advantage to the aspirant in comparison to others who are opting the subject just because someone has asked them to do so. The greatest strength during preparation comes from inside and that will come only when you have a great inclination towards the respective optional subject. The formula for cracking the Civil Services is - Something of Everything (General Studies) Everything of Something (Optional Subject)

So, here it comes…According to recent trend the most scoring one is political science by replacing history which has become second highest scoring in Upsc as optional. But, public administration is giving tough competition . As it has been seen in in results of Uppcs in 2016 results so, you can go for anyone it also depend on your interest in the particular subject. best of luck……thanks for reading,, and please upvote my answer..
